title: Fly's Purgatory
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-nb-alt= --]]]

[[module CSS]]
    :root {
        --header-gradient-color-bottom: 91, 206, 250;
       --bright-accent: 91, 206, 250;
       --pale-accent: 91, 206, 250;
       --dark-accent: 40, 16, 60;
       --hover-link-color: 91, 206, 250;
       --visited-link-color: 91, 206, 250;
       --link-color: 175, 193, 199;
       --footnotes-footer-num-color: 91, 206, 250;
       --hoverblock-header-bg:  40, 16, 60;
    --header-title: "Fly's Purgatory";
    --header-subtitle: "Abandon all hope, ye who enter here";

.foldable-list-container a {
    border-bottom: none;}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-title {
  display: none;
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.icn-spinner {
   animation: spin-animation 6s infinite;
   margin: auto;
   width: 30%;
}

.icn-spinner2 {
   animation: spin-animation 2s infinite;
   margin: auto;
   width: 15%;
}

@keyframes spin-animation {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/component%3Acolstyle/1');
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Initialising## [[/size]]
Loading...
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="icn-spinner"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20Logo.png]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|THIS PAGE IS CURRENTLY UNDERGOING CONSTRUCTION## [[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= [[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Tool enabled## [[/size]]
[[module ListUsers users="."]]
= ##5BCEFA|Hi there %%title%%!##
[[/module]]
= ##5BCEFA|Welcome to the SwanTran Guide through Fly's Purgatory. I am a figment of Fly's imagination, here to make your reading experience a little easier!##
[[=]]
##5BCEFA|What would you like to read?##
[[div class="inline-colmod"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop-deep ifprot=0 |nohide=true |folded=1 |hide= |show=Something written by Fly]]
I see you have great taste!
[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend-deep nohide=true |hide= ]]
[[/div]]

##5BCEFA|Want to leave a note? Contact Fly via the SwanTran Changelog Queue!##
[[/=]]


[[collapsible show="Author Will" hide="Close"]]
After 6 months of inactivity, custodianship of all my collabs go to co-authors and all solo-works to [[*user sailorenoch]], who also has my email for contact. After a year of inactivity, ownership goes to [[*user sailorenoch]].
If you have a collab with me that we never finished, you can continue it after 3 months of not being able to get into contact with me.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Changelog## [[/size]]

##5BCEFA|There is (1) new file assigned to your queue.##

++++ Latest SCP
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8166 SCP-8166] || Eastward of Eden (Eventyr)||
-----

##5BCEFA|You also have been assigned (1) new research document.##

++++ Latest Tale
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/furball FURBALL] || Part of Site-312, a follow-up to SCP-7462 ||

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[div class="icn-spinner2"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20loading%20blue.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Tool Suggestion## [[/size]]

+ Eventyr
++ The cycle continues, set to a new tune
"Not many things happen only once upon a time."

A folklore/fairytale/literary remixing the SCP lore of old (and new). The dark whimsy of fairytales and folklore, and the absurdity of everyday. Also very gay.
-----

++ HUB
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/eventyr-hub The cycle will continue, but now we set the tune.]

++ SCPs
||~ Entry ||~ Title ||~ A story about ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8166 SCP-8166] || Eastward of Eden ||  A trans fairytale about identity, guilded prisons, and the Cornwall Incident. 8kcon entry with Aster and Faust, and the cornerstone of Eventyr||
|||||||| "Why did they eat that forbidden fruit? Why did they hunger for knowledge and throw us all from Paradise? Had it been I in that fruitful garden, I would not have let Sin enter the world." He believed those words the day he first thought them, and still did the day he fell." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7462 SCP-7462] || And every night, Alagadda drags you back. || Eventyr's Alagadda, an the origins of Hermeneutics. Remixcon ||
|||||||| "//Who is that shade, who stands to the side? A figure in shadow, a King untied."// ||


++ Tales
||~ Title ||~ Featuring ||~ A story about ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tinkertailorsoldierjailor Tinker Tailor Soldier Jailor] || Clef, Strelnikov and an introduction of Kondraki, Rights and Crow || A recently defected GOC agent arrives at Site-19, and meets a security guard that equals him in bullshit. With Faust!||
|||||| "The Foundation is exhausting. Terribly precise, infuriatingly formulaic. A caricature of bureaucracy. Of course, you knew that before you joined them." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dragandrabbits Draven & Dmitri hit the Stage] || Strelnikov and Draven Kondraki || Drag, rabbits, growing up and coming out. A Pridecon entry written with Faust and Waxx. ||
|||||| "You cannot fly if you dare not to fall. But once you let go, you can find those willing to catch you.." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ponyposting Pony Posting is Now Banned at Site-19] || Several ponies? || April Fools 2024 post with Aster and Faust!  ||
|||||| "Classified documentation pertaining to several SCP objects has been circulated along the senior staff offices of Site-19’s East Wing. There appears to be a picture of a cartoon horse included in each of them." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/altoid-clef Lecture notes of Dr. Clef's workshop, "Real Life and You: How to Survive when Barely Functional."] || Clef, Kondraki, and a little Gears || Clef is a maladapted goblin. With Nico and Prismal! ||
|||||| "Had this odd catatonia not been the best sleep he'd had in a dog's age, he would be much more irate. The only problem, as it were, was that he couldn't remember exactly what had happened to lead up to this situation." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ripclef Agent, Father, Motherfucker: Alto Clef, in memoriam] || Clef and many more || Clef dies in a car crash. Opinions are had. Eventyr megacollab. ||
|||||| "On August 12th, 2017 at 7am, Agent Alto Clef was killed in a fatal car wreck, which, most people would agree, was quite a lovely thing." ||
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[div class="icn-spinner2"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20loading%20blue.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Tool Suggestion## [[/size]]

+ SITE 312

++ SCPs
||~ Entry ||~ Title ||~ Featuring ||~ A story about ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7422 SCP-7422] || A random string of 1s and 0s || Mx. Harrit Swanepoel || Containing those who don't accept you [cw: queerphobia] ||
|||||||| "Error. User credentials not recognised." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7873 SCP-7873] || Cultural Exchange Program || Researcher Gijs van Oosterbeek & Agent Jacob Banks || Memory, legacy, Americanisation. A collab with scalykitty for Goblincon ||
|||||||| "Is this how you want to be remembered?" ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7944 SCP-7944] || The shadows we cast || Gijs van Oosterbeek, Harrit Swanepoel, Sterre de Veer & Jacob Banks || The impressions we leave on the world and parenthood. My Art Exchange 2023 gift to NicktheBrink1 ||
|||||||| "A man is the shadow he casts on the world." - AS ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7462 SCP-7462] || And every night, Alagadda drags you back. || Agent Jan Claessen, Anna Dubois || Temptation, and Alagadda's answer [Remixcon] ||
|||||||| "//Who is that shade, who stands to the side? A figure in shadow, a King untied."// ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7852 SCP-7852] || An emptiness, burned into the fabric of life || Agent Jan Claessen || Giving more than you have to a job ||
|||||||| "I can handle it. I have it all under control." ||

++ Tales
||~ Title ||~ Featuring ||~ A story about ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-mundanity-of-you-and-him The mundanity of you and him] || Gijs van Oosterbeek, Daniël van den Bosch || Pride 2023: the mundane wonder of marriage ||
|||||| "You weren’t made for mundanity, even if you craved it." ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/furball FURBALL] || Anna Dubois || Spook Nicon entry 2024: the corrupting horror of a system meant to oppress ||
|||||| "You can’t disguise a smell. A sweet, flowery smell of decay and the inevitable." ||

[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="icn-spinner2"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20loading%20blue.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Tool Suggestion## [[/size]]

++ ESSAYS & RESOURCES

-----

||~ Entry Designation ||~ Context ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/talk-the-talk-writing-seminar-dialogue Talk the Talk] || Writing Club script essay ||
||||A demonstration on setting up dialogue, and especially how to analyse it. ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/writingclub-plotnarrative Plot vs. Narrative] || Writing Club script essay || 
||||What is plot, what is narrative, and how do they fit together? An analysis of Series 1 articles to demonstrate, with Psi! ||

|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/theme:eventyr Eventyr theme] || Theme to use on Eventyr articles || 
||||First time making a theme, thanks to Queer, Nico and Fish! ||

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

++ OTHER CANON

-----

||~ Entry Designation ||~ Title ||~ Setting ||
|| [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2704 SCP-2704] || The Lonely Star || The Midwestern town of Chugwater, created by (and collab with) SYTYCFanon ||
|||||| Ever wondered what answers you might find on the bottom of a glass of soda? ||
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[div class="icn-spinner2"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20loading%20blue.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@

= [[size large]] SwanTran Lifeline Chat Initiated [[/size]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
{{##5BCEFA|//**SwanTran-Lifeline [FLY]** is typing a message...//##}}
{{**SwanTran-Lifeline [FLY]:** ??}}
-----
* {{**Poohbear [CatPurrrrgatorio]:** where food?}}
* Follow-up[Y]:  added automated feeding script. Blocked future requests.
-----
* {{**Man of Mystery [Mr. Purgatorio]:** you get weirder by the day.}}
* Follow-up: [N]
-----
* {{**Evert Wijdig-Aardappel [ParallelPotatoes]:** SwanTran could use a bit more chaotic energy like its competitor, GooseTran. Significant lack of horribleness. 7/10.}}
* Follow-up[Y]:  request forwarded to Gijs "Goose" van Oosterbeek.
* {{**Gijs [Goose]:** Which me-me is this, Harrit? I don't get it.}}
-----
* {{**Britt van Olde Nit [BitOddInnit]:** Please fix the speech to text it keeps changing to Toki Pona mid-sentence. Otherwise enjoyable experience. 7/10}}
* Follow-up[Y]:  Speech to text now switches to Frysk yn 'e midden fan' e sin.
-----
* {{**Carla Bontekoe [cafecow]:** UI might be bugged, it keeps giving me messages about how the "inevitable arms of decay are waiting patiently to welcome me home". Unsettling, but comforting. 7.5/10}}
* Follow-up[Y]: UI checked, now correctly displays message in Dutch.
-----
* {{**Tom Poes [Scalykitty]:** Keeps complaining about the “americanisation” of english spelling. Can we update to fix the typo?}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Corrected spelling of "[https://www.bommelentompoesmuseum.nl/ Tom Poes] [Scalykitty]" to "[https://nl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tompoes Tompouce] [Schubbekat]".
-----
* {{**Servatius van On [SYTYCFanon]:** 0/10 I can't use this to speak to swans. What am I supposed to do when they take over?}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Accept inevitability.
-----
* {{**Jan Verdronkene [DrowningDutchman]:** Why does this thing assume it's a female name?}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Corrected gender module. Jan is now a Big Boy.
-----
* {{**Kristal Viroras [Prismal]:** why is my lord and savior WAN a swan? Glad to see WAN finally given credit as a trans icon though.}}
* Follow-up[Y]: WAN trans fursona.
-----
* {{**Sterre de Veer [AstersQuill]:** This thing has a habit of replying to short queries with large bodies of text. Is this a feature or a bug?}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Since I know you're the nicest person here, I know you mean this as an actual question and the harsh roast was accidental. But you get me thinking here! What is a feature, what is a bug, and how can a bug become a feature? I'd like to [See document Tangent#71 Page 31-89 for full review of request].
-----
* {{**Nico de Oom-Linie [Uncle Nicolini]:** [ERROR, FIELD CANNOT BE NULL]}}
* Follow-up[Y]: You can't tell me what I can or cannot be, uncle! I'm an adult now!
-----
* {{**Arja van Draad [AriadnesThread]:** I don't know exactly what SwanTran is but it's great and neat and so are you.}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Changed upvote button to 'neat' button.
-----
* {{**Raoul "Rakker" Kanner [rakkran]:** 6/10, wonderful program but loses points for trying to deliver messages in this gibberish it calls "Dutch".}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Rakker m'n makker, waar heb je 't over. Ik spreek geen gibber.
-----
* {{**Maarten Nijverheid [IndustryStandard]:** I find I'm struggling to misuse your program :/ Could you turn some dials and fix that please?}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Added 7 new buttons that make the user experience less optimal.
-----
* {{**Anne Slikkers [Anky Swallow]:** This program is great! It just keeps trying to propose to me. Standards have not been sufficiently worn down as of yet.}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Please just install the update. That's all I'm asking.
-----
* {{**Orion "Ori" Dieveling [OriTiefling]:** Ori.}}
* Follow-up[Y]: Ori
-----
{{##5BCEFA|//**SwanTran-Lifeline [FLY]** has ended the session.//##}}
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[div class="icn-spinner2"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/flys-purgatory/Swantran%20loading%20bluepink.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= [[size large]] ##5BCEFA|SwanTran Tool Changelog## [[/size]]
[[2024-01-10: Fragmentation reverted on [SCP-7944].}}
{{2023-09-04: Interpretation added, value=TRUE, uploaded file [SCP-7462].}}
{{2023-06-29: Completed Landing Page module.}}
{{**Coen de Hond [Cubeflix]** and **Jacob Verwant [Jackalrelated]** optimised animation and file orientation.}}
{{**[FlyPurgatorio]** added new logo}}
{{2023-06-24: Rewrote code on module [SCP-7873].}}
{{2023-06-24: Added new documentation on [mundanity].}}
{{2023-06-13: Closed unexpected void-sequence in [SCP-7852].}}
{{2023-05-23: Initial iteration of [SCP-7873] before re-sequencing.}}
{{2023-05-03: Power outage registered in [SCP-7422], rebooting initialised.}}
{{2023-04-15: Joined existing file [2704].}}
{{2023-02-24: SwanTran initiated.}}
[[/div]]
@@ @@
